CustomField.description: Formula field that pulls account address fields from VCC Case
CustomField.formula: VCC_Case__r.Account.BillingStreet & BR() & VCC_Case__r.Account.BillingCity & BR() & VCC_Case__r.Account.BillingState & BR() & VCC_Case__r.Account.BillingPostalCode &BR() & VCC_Case__r.Account.BillingCountry
CustomField.label: Veteran's Current Address
